item.title: Sausage and Cabbage
item.description: Ingredients Head of cabbage Onion Clove of garlic (1 tsp of minced garlic) 2 packages of sausage (buy two different ones if desired for more flavors) 1⁄4 cup of water (or broth) Salt Pepper Instructions Turn the instant pot onto saut√© with some vegetable oil. Cut up the onion, cabbage, and sausage. Put the onion, garlic, and sausage into the pot. Saute for a couple of minutes, just to cook and brown it.
